---

title: "Import Key"

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Import Key"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/import_key"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Import a wallet using a mnemonic phrase or private key. Optionally saves secrets and automatically logs in.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"Request parameters for the import_key endpoint","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Import a wallet key","required":["name","key"],"properties":{"derivation_index":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","description":"Starting derivation index","default":0,"minimum":0},"emoji":{"type":["string","null"],"description":"Optional emoji identifier"},"hardened":{"type":["boolean","null"],"description":"Optional hardened derivation count"},"key":{"type":"string","description":"Mnemonic phrase or private key"},"login":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether to automatically login after import","default":true},"name":{"type":"string","description":"Display name for the wallet"},"save_secrets":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether to save secrets to keychain","default":true},"unhardened":{"type":["boolean","null"],"description":"Optional unhardened derivation count"}},"title":"ImportKey"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful response from import_key","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Response with imported key fingerprint","required":["fingerprint"],"properties":{"fingerprint":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","description":"Fingerprint of the imported key","example":1234567890,"minimum":0}},"title":"ImportKeyResponse"}}}},"400":{"description":"Bad request - invalid parameters or malformed JSON"},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized - no wallet is currently logged in, or authentication is required"},"404":{"description":"Not found - requested resource doesn't exist (e.g., NFT, offer, transaction)"},"500":{"description":"Internal server error - unexpected failure in wallet operations"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
